about_the_game:
Rule the Sands: Command, Conquer, and Create in Ancient Egypt

Step into the heart of the ancient world with Egypt, a groundbreaking real-time strategy game that transports you to the golden age of Egypt. From the fertile banks of the Nile to the harsh sands of the desert, every decision shapes your journey to greatness. Whether you dream of building towering monuments, waging epic battles, or mastering the secrets of the gods, your path to power is yours to carve.

🌊 Master the Nile, Master the Land
Harness the life-giving power of the Nile River. The Nile is your lifeblood. Plan your city’s growth around its seasonal floods, constructing canals and reservoirs to ensure survival during droughts. But beware—mismanagement could turn the river’s bounty into a force of destruction.

🏛️ Build Cities Worthy of the Gods
Design awe-inspiring cities, complete with bustling markets, sacred temples, and iconic pyramids. Every structure you build has a purpose—fortify your defenses, inspire your people, and draw the favor of the gods. Balance grandeur with practicality as you expand your influence.

⚔️ Lead Armies to Glory
Recruit diverse units, from swift charioteers and disciplined spearmen to mythological creatures like Anubis guardians and winged harpies. Engage in tactical battles where terrain, formation, and timing can turn the tide. Outmaneuver your enemies or crush them with sheer power.

🐪 Trade, Conquer, or Deceive
Forge alliances or dominate your rivals through force, cunning, or diplomacy. Negotiate with neighboring kingdoms, establish lucrative trade routes, or deploy spies to sow chaos within their borders.

🌀 Harness the Power of the Gods
Appease deities like Ra, Anubis, and Isis to gain access to divine powers. Summon sandstorms to shield your forces, unleash locust plagues on enemy lands, or heal your armies with sacred blessings. But anger the gods, and your empire may suffer their wrath.

📜 Dynamic Campaign Mode
Experience a story-driven campaign where your decisions shape the outcome. Navigate political intrigue, fend off invasions, and make choices that influence the fate of Egypt. Will you be remembered as a benevolent ruler or a ruthless conqueror?

🌞 Dynamic World and Seasons
Adapt your strategies to an ever-changing environment. Face challenges like droughts, sandstorms, and invasions, while leveraging the unique advantages of Egypt’s diverse regions, from lush oases to barren deserts.

🎨 A World Alive with Detail
Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted world filled with bustling cities, verdant farmlands, and mysterious ruins. Witness the ebb and flow of life, from priests conducting rituals to merchants haggling in the marketplace.

🎮 Multiplayer and Community-Driven Modes
Compete in multiplayer skirmishes or collaborate in co-op modes, building alliances and clashing against other players in large-scale battles. Design custom maps and scenarios to share with the community, ensuring endless replayability.

🎶 An Epic Soundtrack to Match Your Legacy
Experience an immersive musical score inspired by ancient Egypt, blending traditional instruments with modern orchestral compositions to accompany your rise to greatness.

Will You Rule with Wisdom or an Iron Fist?

Your choices will define the future of Egypt. Will you cultivate prosperity and peace, or conquer and command through fear? The sands await your story.

name: Egypt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600x or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2060 or higher with 6GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Command the sands of Egypt in this epic RTS! Build magnificent cities, lead mythic armies, and harness the power of the gods. Shape the Nile, forge alliances, and rise to become Pharaoh in a world of strategy, intrigue, and breathtaking battles. Your legacy awaits—rule wisely!
